name: One Note Only
description:
When AI gets 1 magical music block, you get 1.

When AI gets 2 magical music blocks, you get 1.

When Ai gets 3 magical music blocks, you get 1.

But the puzzles are the same! Can you do it?

Additional Controls: 
R to restart level, Q to go back to first level, S to skip a level, and A to go back a level

Designed for GMTK 48 hour Jam, 2019. 

p.s. The sound effects might be quite crowded at times, sorry about that.  

I really wanted to take this opportunity to learn the programming language Rust, so this game is written completely using Rust, which means a lot of things are just amazingly difficult! I originally planned to include 2 more mechanics: one drag, and one release, and many more levels, but o'well. Please comment if you are somewhat interested, that will put a smile on my face!
